channel.title: 100 Errors

item.title: 100 Errors
item.dc:creator: @dowon8 dowon8
item.description:
@dowon8 wrote:

Ok, I posted this before, but I really need help! I tried to edit my client.java and i compiled and got 100 errors. Some said brackets are missing or needs to be added. Please tell me:

if (command.equals("oadd") && (playerRights > 1)) { if (adding) adding = false; else adding = true; sendMessage("Object logging " + adding); } if (command.equals("alltome") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client 
                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
               }
       }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcreset”) && playerRights >= 1){

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("enableduel") && (playerRights > 3)) { server.dueling = true; yell("Duel enabled"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("disablepk") && (playerName.equals("NONAME"))) { server.pking = false; yell("Pking disabled"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("enablepk") && (playerRights > 0)) { server.pking = true; yell("Pking enabled"); } 
  if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("chillzone") && playerRights >= 1)
  {
     teleportToX = 3056;
     teleportToY = 4975;

heightLevel = 1;
}
if (command.startsWith(“button”)) {
currentStatus = 1;
currentButton = 1;
spamButton = true;
}

Read full topic
